email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope you're doing well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for a laycan of Oct 15-20. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The starting freight rate is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider something in the mid-40s, say $45.50 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but $45.50 is a bit tight given current market conditions. How about we meet in the middle at $48.00 per metric ton? The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.00 is still a bit high for us. Could you do $47.00? Also, can we extend the laycan to Oct 15-22 to give us more flexibility? The demurrage rate is acceptable. Let me know if this works. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve discussed with the owners, and they’ve agreed to $47.00 per metric ton. The laycan can be extended to Oct 15-22 as requested. Please confirm if we can proceed, and I’ll draft the charter party agreement. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, that sounds good. Let’s proceed at $47.00 per metric ton with the extended laycan. Please send over the draft agreement, and we’ll review it. Thanks for your help on this. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. I’ll send over the draft charter party agreement shortly. Thanks for your cooperation, and let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best regards, Sarah
